tool_description: Extracts specific content from web pages using CSS selectors and returns cleaned HTML or text content.

url.description: Target URL to extract content from

css_selectors.description: CSS selectors to identify content elements

extract_text_only.description: Whether to return text content only or include HTML tags

max_content_length.description: Maximum length of extracted content (100-10000 characters)

error_messages: Invalid URL: Provide a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.
Invalid CSS selector: One or more CSS selectors are malformed.
Content length limit exceeded: max_content_length must be between 100 and 10000.
Page load failed: Unable to load the specified URL.
usage: Provide a URL and CSS selectors to extract specific content. Set extract_text_only to false if HTML formatting is needed.

extracted_content.description: Content extracted using each CSS selector

extraction_timestamp.description: When the content was extracted in ISO 8601 format

content_hash.description: Hash of the extracted content for change detection
